DOC.brief_title: The Effects Of Whole Body Vibration On Postural Control In Patients With Ataxia
DOC.detailed_description: Patients randomly assign 2 group , group 1 take exercise therapy , group 2 take exercise therapy whole body vibration together . After 1 week wash-out period , patient assign therapy period . All assessment repeat therapy period . Exercise therapy consist select balance , coordination walking exercise accord individual needs patient . Whole body vibration ( 20-30 Hz , minimum amplitude ) apply case form 4 set ( 1 min application 1min rest . ) Cases take treatment 1-hour , 3 day week 8 week . The evaluation parameter consist demographic information , Computerized Dynamic Posturography , International Cooperative Ataxia Rating Scale , Trunk Impairment Scale , Berg Balance Scale , Barthel Index Goal Assessment Scale .
